content.rendered:
Hello. This is the FOSS4G-Asia Seoul team.

We would like to introduce our Silver sponsor, EGIS.
EGIS specializes in providing systematic and scientific information in the field of GIS Engine Software and GIS application solutions. They support tailored consulting services for various customer environments
by developing mobile 3D engines and engines based on web standards, including HTML5.
We appreciate their sponsorship and look forward to your interest in FOSS4G-Asia 2023 Seoul.
